content:
Since both the BlueButton IG and the PlanNet (provider directory) IG's are required as per the CMS rule and both have a 1/1/2021 go live date I wanted to post some info about this IG so that others who may not be familiar know where to look:
ZulipChat: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/229922-Da.2BVinci.2BPDex.2BPlan-Net
IG: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/index.html (under development)

Other helpful links are posted here: https://www.cms.gov/Regulations-and-Guidance/Guidance/Interoperability/index
